job.name: Gantt_Chart

variable.name: url
variable.description: Base url of the ProActive scheduler from which the monitoring data will be extracted.

variable.name: palette
variable.description: Color scheme, the Gantt chart will be printed using several shades of the given palette.

variable.name: color_key
variable.description: The Gantt chart will display colored monitoring data according to a given metric. For example, if color_key is jobid, the chart will display a different color for each job id.

variable.name: title
variable.value: Gantt chart from ProActive resources usage and Scheduler jobs

variable.name: from
variable.description: Monitoring data start time. Jobs submitted after the given datetime will be present in the Gantt chart.

variable.name: to
variable.description: Monitoring data end time. Jobs submitted before the given datetime will be present in the Gantt chart.

variable.name: jobname
variable.description: Regular expression which allows to filter jobs by name

variable.name: jobid
variable.description: If not empty, include in the Gantt chart only data of the given job id.

variable.name: taskname
variable.description: Regular expression which allows to filter ProActive workflow tasks by name

variable.name: node
variable.description: Regular expression which allows to filter displaying of ProActive Nodes by name

variable.name: CREDENTIALS_KEY
variable.description: Name of the third-party credentials entry which stores the connection password.

job.description: Generate a Gantt chart from ProActive Resources usages and Scheduler Jobs. Please setup SCHEDULER_PASSWORD third-party credentials (See Administrator Documentation to learn more).

task.name: pa_plot
task.description: The simplest task, ran by a bash engine.

variable.name: DOCKER_ENABLED
variable.description: If true, the workflow tasks will be executed inside a docker container

script.code:
if [ -z $variables_jobid ] then jobid_argument="" else jobid_argument="--jobid $variables_jobid" fi
echo "BEFORE--> $variables_from $variables_to"
if [[ $variables_from == "0000-00-00 00:00" ]] then variables_from=$(date -d '15 minutes ago' "+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M") variables_to=$(date "+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M") fi echo "AFTER--> $variables_from $variables_to"
TMP_VAR=credentials_${variables_CREDENTIALS_KEY}
pa_plot --url $variables_url -u $variables_PA_USER -p "${!TMP_VAR}" -o gantt_chart.html --palette $variables_palette --color_key $variables_color_key --width $variables_width --height $variables_height --title "$variables_title" --from "$variables_from" --to "$variables_$variables_to" --jobname "$variables_jobname" --taskname "$variables_taskname" --node "$variables_node" $jobid_argument

metadata.visualization: pa_plot
